> 0, "Username is required to reassign Task"); 
if ( ${User_List_Single_Select2/Single_Select1}.getData().value.length <= 0) {
return ${User_List_Single_Select2/Single_Select1}.isValid();
} else if (${MatchingTasks2}.getSelectedRecords().length <= 0) {
//${Modal_Alert1}.setVisible(true);
}
else {
//alert(${MatchingTasks2}.getSelectedRecords().length);
${../Bulk_Task_Reassign1}.setData(${MatchingTasks2}.getSelectedRecords());
}

//${Modal_Alert1}.setVisible(true);
}
else {

${../Bulk_Task_Reassign1}.setData(${MatchingTasks2}.getSelectedRecords());
}
